statements: SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_activity_logs WHERE activity_type = 'logout';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM user_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logs FROM user_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logs > 5 ORDER BY total_logs DESC
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity_logs WHERE activity_type LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT timestamp, activity_details FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, CONCAT('User ID: ', CAST(user_id AS VARCHAR), ' - ', activity_type) AS user_activity FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity_type FROM user_activity_logs WHERE activity_type='login';
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT * FROM voice_recognition_performance WHERE recognition_accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity_type, activity_description FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, activity_type FROM user_activity_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, COUNT(activity_type) AS activity_count FROM user_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id, activity_type ORDER BY user_id, activity_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_activity_timestamp FROM user_activity_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 3;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, recognition_accuracy FROM voice_recognition_performance WHERE recognition_accuracy >= 0.9 ORDER BY recognition_accuracy DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM UserActivityLogs;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM UserActivityLogs ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM VoiceRecognitionSessions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT session_id, session_start, session_end FROM VoiceRecognitionSessions WHERE session_start > '2022-01-01';
SELECT recognition_type, recognition_accuracy, recognized_text FROM VoiceRecognitionResults WHERE recognition_accuracy >= 0.95 ORDER BY recognition_accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserActivityLogs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM UserActivityLogs ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT session_id, user_id, session_start, session_end FROM VoiceRecognitionSessions WHERE session_start > '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, recognition_type, recognition_accuracy FROM VoiceRecognitionResults WHERE recognition_accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY recognition_accuracy DESC;

SELECT user_id, SUM(recognition_accuracy) AS total_accuracy FROM UserActivityLogs JOIN VoiceRecognitionSessions ON UserActivityLogs.user_id = VoiceRecognitionSessions.user_id JOIN VoiceRecognitionResults ON VoiceRecognitionSessions.session_id = VoiceRecognitionResults.session_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_accuracy > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM UserActivityLogs;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM RecognizedPhrases WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT task_id, audio_file_name FROM VoiceRecognitionTasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT user_id, recognition_speed FROM VoiceRecognitionPerformance ORDER BY recognition_accuracy DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, activity_timestamp FROM UserActivityLogs WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM UserActivityLogs;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM UserActivityLogs ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT task_id, audio_file_name, task_status FROM VoiceRecognitionTasks WHERE task_status='Pending';
SELECT task_id, recognized_phrase, confidence_level FROM RecognizedPhrases WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, recognition_accuracy, recognition_speed FROM VoiceRecognitionPerformance WHERE user_id=123;
SELECT * FROM user_activity_logs;
SELECT user_id, activity_time, activity_type FROM user_activity_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM user_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT recognition_result FROM voice_recognition_data WHERE user_id = 5 AND data_id > 100;
SELECT log_time, log_details FROM device_logs WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, activity_description, activity_type, activity_time FROM user_activity_logs ORDER BY activity_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM voice_recognition_data WHERE user_id = 123 AND recognition_result ILIKE '%success%' ORDER BY data_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT log_id, log_details FROM device_logs WHERE device_id = 789 ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT audio_sample_id, sample_format, sample_duration FROM audio_samples WHERE sample_format = 'mp3' ORDER BY sample_duration DESC LIMIT 5;
